FuncDef: This command configures the frequency at which aresolvemessage is sent. Theresolvemessage is an ARP-request or NS message flooded to all the non-EVPN endpoints in the service irrespective of the current status of theunknown-arp-request-flood-evpnorunknown-ns-flood-evpncommands.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the frequency in minutes at which the resolve message is issued. Values-1 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 5
